rect.style: fill-rule: evenodd; fill: rgb(187, 44, 44); stroke: rgb(187, 44, 44);
paint-order: stroke; stroke: rgb(32, 64, 86); fill: rgb(255, 255, 255);

text.style: white-space: pre; fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 3.6px;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: ABeeZee; font-size: 8.40517px; stroke: rgb(32, 64, 86); text-transform: capitalize; white-space: pre;
white-space: pre; fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 0.9px;
